title: Trump Tower Atrium Brims With the Brand of Its Namesake
sub_head: As Fifth Avenue rebounds, the building’s retail floor is all Trump, all the time
body:
New stores are beginning to open along Manhattan’s Fifth Avenue as luxury retail and New York rebound from the pandemic.
But the theme inside the Trump Tower retail atrium, located at the prime location of Fifth Avenue and 57th Street, remains all Trump, all the time. Tenants include Trump Sweets, the Trump Store, which sells clothes, and 45 Wine & Whiskey, a bar that displays photos, documents and other memorabilia from Donald Trump’s time as the nation’s 45th president.
